name: Seeking Peace
description:
This demo was created by a small 5 university student team around the theme of peace, 3 of the team members are studying at Confetti (UK) and 2 studying at JAMK (Finland)

Credits

Jared Blackman - Programmer, Level Designer

Ross Tinley-Thorpe - Asset Creation, Level Designer

Kade Griffin - 2D Artist, Texture Artist

Valtteri Louhelainen - Narrative Designer, Writer

Simon Dániel János - Audio Designer

Assets Used

https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/dynamic-stylized-lowpoly-...

https://creazilla.com/nodes/5242-low-poly-people-3d-model

https://vikingtabern.itch.io/3d-foods-for-games
